attributes.action: Please support our application for a Gymnastics Centre for children of all ages
attributes.additional_details:
-The Centres Aim-

*Welcome children of all ages, abilities.

*Drive down childhood obesity in a constructive way.

*Incoperate life skills to help children go into life well rounded.

*Open our doors to children with special educational needs and disabilities.

*Support families with healthy eating.

*Offer reduced sessions to parents & familes in the community that could otherwise not have access activities to get their children active. 

*To provide a safe place for children to get active.
attributes.background:
The planning application for a Gymnastics Wellness Centre that will help children from all walks of life get active and have fun. 

Our local planning office has refused it due to the building only being vacant for 6 months. With 126 letters of support it will now go in front of a committie.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on members of the public to take action, not the Government or Parliament.
